1001.message: This database was not found on our server.

1002.message: This Table was not found in our database or the Table is not a string.

1003.message: This table does not accept empty values.
1003.contact: If you think this is an error, contact your Server Administrator.

1004.message: You must send the same amount of values and columns
1004.contact: If you think this is an error, contact your Server Administrator.

1005.message: Table columns do not receive empty values.

1006.message: You cannot submit more values ​​than your column allows.

2001.message: You need to authenticate to access this area.

2002.message: You do not have permission to access this area.

3001.message: Your request is not valid to enter this area.
3001.contact: If you think this is an error, contact your Server Administrator.

3002.message: You made too many requests, wait a while to be able to access this area again.

3003.message: Your region is blocked from accessing this area.
